PHRASE.LANG: The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

Les fantômes sont dangereux ! Il vaut mieux les éviter. Rejoignez l’extrémité du labyrinthe, touchez le trophée, puis revenez au début. Chaque joueur doit affronter ses propres fantômes... Vous ne verrez que les vôtres !

Die Geister sind gefährlich! Vermeiden Sie jeglichen Kontakt. Durchqueren Sie das Labyrinth bis zum Ende, berühren Sie die Trophäe und kehren Sie an den Anfang zurück. Jeder Spieler muss seinem persönlichen Geist ausweichen ... Sie sehen jeweils nur Ihren eigenen!

I fantasmi sono pericolosi! Evita qualsiasi contatto. Raggiungi la fine del labirinto, tocca il trofeo e ritorna al punto di partenza. Ogni giocatore ha i propri fantasmi da affrontare... Tu vedrai solo i tuoi!

Los fantasmas son peligrosos. Evita cualquier contacto con ellos. Llega hasta el final del laberinto, toca el trofeo y vuelve al principio. Cada jugador tiene sus propios fantasmas a los que enfrentarse... Solo verás los tuyos.

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!

The ghosts are dangerous! Avoid any contact. Get to the end of the maze, touch the trophy and then return to the beginning. Every player has their own personal ghosts to face... You will only see your own!
Appuyez sur [ACCEPT] pour accéder au labyrinthe
Pulsa [ACCEPT] para entrar en el laberinto
Well done - you're half way. Now get back out.
Bien joué. Vous êtes à mi-chemin. Maintenant, revenez.
Die Hälfte ist geschafft. Kehren Sie nun zurück!
Ben fatto: sei a metà dell'opera. Ora torna indietro.
Bien hecho.Ya estás a mitad. Ahora, vuelve a salir.
Well done - you're half way. Now get back out.
